scripts.build:electron:dev: npm run clean:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack/webpack.electron.config.js --mode development
scripts.build:electron:prod: npm run clean:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack/webpack.electron.config.js --mode production
scripts.start:react:dev: npm run clean:react && webpack serve --config webpack/webpack.react.config.js --mode development
scripts.build:react:prod: npm run clean:react && webpack --config webpack/webpack.react.config.js --mode production
scripts.start:all:dev: npm run clean:all && concurrently --kill-others "npm run start:react:dev" "npm run start:electron:dev"
scripts.start:all:prod: npm run clean:all && npm run build:react:prod && npm run start:electron:prod
